      • Cluster

        public Cluster(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String user,
               ClusterStatus status,
               java.lang.String clusterType,
               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> configs,
               java.lang.String version)
        Construct a new Cluster.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the cluster. Not null/empty/blank.
        user - The user who created the cluster. Not null/empty/blank.
        status - The status of the cluster. Not null.
        clusterType - The type of the cluster. Not null/empty/blank.
        configs - The configuration files for the cluster. Not null or empty.
        version - The version of the cluster. Not null/empty/blank.
